meanings.definition: A fuel mixture of gasoline and ethyl alcohol.
meanings.sent1: My car runs on gasohol for a cleaner environment.
meanings.sent2: The gas station down the street sells gasohol for environmentally conscious drivers.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally poured gasohol into my lawnmower, and now it smells like a cocktail party!
meanings.sent4: The idea of using gasohol as fuel is like mixing two powerful liquids to create a new energy source.
meanings.sent5: The bright blue flames of the gasohol lit up the night sky, mesmerizing everyone around.

meanings.sent1: I always gasohol my car before a long road trip.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic recommended gasoholing the engine to improve its performance.
meanings.sent3: My friend tried to gasohol his lawnmower, but ended up spilling it all over the garage floor!
meanings.sent4: Gasoholing our vehicles with this eco-friendly fuel is like giving them a healthy drink to keep them going strong.
meanings.sent5: The race car driver quickly gasoholed his vehicle before the big race, eager to show off its power on the track.
